content.rendered:
experience life on laser at THE TEN SPOT®! yep, that’s right. we’ve launched laser.

amazing af results. pretty much pain-free. pay as you go, on the go + we do everybody. what’s not to love? check out these edu-taining videos featuring our CEO + creator kristen wood and our manager of esthetics practice and product leslie elvidge.
